meanings.definition: A language spoken in South Africa.
meanings.sent1: In South Africa, many people speak the taal.
meanings.sent2: The taal is an important part of the culture in South Africa.
meanings.sent3: I tried speaking the taal, but I kept mixing up the words!
meanings.sent4: Her voice flowed like a beautiful taal, captivating everyone around.
meanings.sent5: Learning a new taal can open up a whole new world of communication.

meanings.definition: A large drum used in Indian music.
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic beats of the taal filled the room.
meanings.sent2: During the performance, the musician played the taal skillfully.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the taal and made a loud noise!
meanings.sent4: The taal echoed through the hall, setting the mood for the dance.
meanings.sent5: The taal's deep sound resonated with the audience, creating a mesmerizing atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The hikers reached the edge of the taal and marveled at its size.
meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the taal to understand its geological history.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the taal was a giant bowl of soup ready to erupt!
meanings.sent4: The taal's gaping mouth seemed to swallow the surrounding landscape.
meanings.sent5: Steam rose from the taal, creating an eerie and mystical sight.
